text: Pajomʙaronason guftand: «Ojo dar zoti Alloh va jaktoparastii U, ki ofarinandai osmonhovu zamin ast, sakke hast? Sumoro da'vat mekunad, to gunohonatonro ʙijomurzad va to muddati muajjan sumoro zinda guzorad va dar dunjo azoʙaton nakunad». Guftand: «Sumo ʙa cuz odami, monandi mo kasi digar nested. Mexohed moro az on ci padaronamon meparastidand, ʙozdored va dar haqiqat ʙudani on ci ki megued ʙaroi mo dalele ravsan ʙijovared!»
